imagingbook.lib.util

Class LinearContainer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.util.LinearContainer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>

    public class LinearContainer<T>
extends Object
implements Iterable<T>
    This class implements a 1D map for arbitrary objects with flexible bottom and top index, similar to an array in Pascal. Containers are immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearContainer(int n)
      Creates a LinearContainer with the index range [0, n - 1], like an ordinary array.
      LinearContainer(int botIndex, int topIndex)
      Creates a LinearContainer with the index range [botIndex, topIndex].

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearContainer

        public LinearContainer(int n)
        Creates a LinearContainer with the index range [0, n - 1], like an ordinary array.
        Parameters:
        n - size of the container.

      • LinearContainer

        public LinearContainer(int botIndex,
                       int topIndex)
        Creates a LinearContainer with the index range [botIndex, topIndex].
        Parameters:
        botIndex - bottom (smallest) index.
        topIndex - top (largest) index.
